description:
Paint like the Pros is a painting instructional course developed by one of California's most respected painting companies; Calipaintco. This course is specifically developed to teach home owners, how to prep and paint effectively, so that they to can produce a professional looking paint job. 

What you need to take the course:

All equipment will be outlined in the course.

What will you learn:

-How to prep before you start painting

-What tools you should always use to achieve a professional looking paint job

-How to clean surfaces before painting

-How to sand surfaces effectively before painting

-How to fill nail holes with one easy technique 

-How to caulk effectively

-How to drywall effectively

-How to tape off effectively

-How to use drop cloths effectively

-How to cut in effectively before rolling out

-How to roll out walls and ceilings effectively

-How to paint doors, trim and baseboards

-How to clean your brushes

-A recap on everything from start to finish 

How long will the course take to complete

To get the most from this course, we suggest you take your time. Watch each video at least three times and then practice what we show you. We suggest you start in the order we have the videos within this course.  

Why should you take this course

Most How-to videos about painting are boring. We have made our instructional series fun, cool and enjoyable to watch. We have brought a fresh approach by using state of the art cameras, slow motion footage and up to date editing techniques. We are able to present the techniques in an effective way; allowing you to easily digest the information we are giving you.
title: A beginners guide to painting your home like a pro
